alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, western Liberty and northeastern Harris Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Little York / Homestead, or near Aldine, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Humble, Near Northside Houston, Aldine, Northside / Northline, Kingwood, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, northeastern Greater Heights, The Woodlands, Greater Fifth Ward, Oak Ridge North, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Eastex / Jensen Area, The Woodlands Pavillion, Hunterwood, El Dorado / Oates Prairie, Hidden Valley, Independence Heights, Settegast and Atascocita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
